reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable, well-made, and appreciate its soft material, with one noting it skims the body without clinging. Moreover, the dress is versatile, suitable for both casual and formal occasions, and one customer mentions it pairs well with a sweater tied at the waist. However, the length receives mixed feedback, with some finding it perfect while others say it's too short.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just Perfect!! sleek and beautiful ---looks and feels like $400.00 dress I bought before
items.body: OMG! this dress is perfect! the material feels very expensive. It was cool and didn't show the arm fat. I go many compliments on it at a class reunion. Simple to dress up with a couple of bracelets and a necklace- nude sandals... It felt fabulous. I would buy it in every color LOL! I am a little busty and most dresses that fit that area are huge and hang- but this one fit perfectly and flattered my figure. I wish I had a picture!! It was the best buy for me of all the clothes I bought this past year. I liked that it DID not have pockets as that makes the dress wide at the hips. Super comfortable and just beautiful in black. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love This Dress!
items.body: This is an amazing dress. I ordered black and it has become my go-to "little black dress." It's incredibly comfortable, and the fit is very flattering. Perfect for parties, weddings, and even casual wear. Simple lines that flatter the body. I am 5 feet 2 inches and 105 pounds. The small fits perfectly. I ordered a second dress in navy. The lighter colors offered did not flatter my body, but the black and navy look great. Read more
items.author: Gretta Lund

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Everyone needs a little black dress.
items.body: This dress is extremely soft. It is very modest and cute. It can be worn with tennis shoes for a more casual look, or dressed up with cute heels and a handbag. It accentuates curves and gives you a cute figure; however, it is not tight-fitting. I bought this dress for work and love the quality. It does not have pockets and is not see-through. It is not overly thick. It can be worn in both summer and fall/spring. The sleeveless dress makes it very breathable. I look forward to pairing this with different shoes to dress up my daily work attire. The only reason I gave it a 4-star is because the style is not my absolute favorite. But it will be cute :) Read more
items.author: Lainey Trahan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful soft fabric and great fit!
items.body: This dress are so flattering! I bought this dress in 3 colors and just ordered 3 more colors. I am 5’6 and 172 lbs and the large fit great! It’s a very sophisticated look which you can dress up with your favorite jewelry or keep it simple for work or around town. It’s that comfortable! The only negative and I didn’t take away a star for, is that be careful when applying deodorant with a light-colored dress and allow it to dry throughly before wearing because it will cause a temporary wet stain, but will eventually dry. It is unsightly, put I now know. I highly recommend this dress, especially at this low price! Read more
items.author: PT

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple black shift dress
items.body: Ordered black, Size Small. True to size. Did not have side slits, which I prefer! I am petite and falls to couple of inches above the knee. Buttery soft smooth stretchy fabric, feels like 100% poly but label says poly/rayon/spandex as in description. Don't think will be too hot in this sleeveless style. Love the simple style which can go to work or wear with sandals/sneakers on a weekend. Love it and thinking about another color. Update: ONE side slit on Left side - might hand sew that shut. Dress washed and dryer on low well. Love it so much will buy more. Coffee color is as pictured, medium to dark taupe color with a nice sheen. Read more
items.author: SparklingWaters

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sophisticated
items.body: To short. Most of Amazon dresses are to short. Definitely made for people with no backside. Love the look. Not harsh on the skin. Good quality for the price Read more
items.author: Tyshie Brown

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Short, busty girls of the world, rejoice!
items.body: This is my Goldilocks dress - JUST RIGHT! I am 5’0”, 40-33-40 and Amazon recommended a large. This is the perfect work dress for me as a teacher. Bought one and threw it on after some sprays of Downey wrinkle release for the vacuum sealed wrinkles and was out the door in 5 minutes. Wore it for a hour and then literally ordered 6 more in different colors for about $100! So cheap, but doesn’t look it. And because I live in SoCal, I can wear it year round by layering. No lining and no pockets, but that’s better for the weather here anyway. And the material just slinks over your body, thick enough to not show any lumps and bumps, but thin enough to not be hot. The top fits correctly, and the darting allows it to hug the girls without leaving gaping holes in the armpit. The waist was loose enough to move comfortably, but fitted enough to not look like a sack. The bottom was a loose enough to not show any VPL, but not a swing or trapeze shape. It’s the perfect length on me. I’m so short that most “short” dresses go past my knee, but this one is right above it. When you sit, it will ride up, and the slit on the side will go higher, so it may be more of a tunic length for you taller ladies, but won’t be indecent if you wear bike shorts under them just in case the slit rides too high. For summer, I threw on some sandals. For work, I can throw some heels on for big presentations, or wear sneakers for running around and still look professional while being comfortable and still able to get down on the ground, if needed. Most of the colors are discounted right now, so my fellow professional shorties- scoop them up now before they realize what they have! UPDATE- the dress is still awesome. I’ve gotten several compliments. Navy and black are my favorites. I ended up returning the lighter colors I got. The dresses were cut exactly the same, but the colors didn’t looks right on my complexion and some had a shine to them that was more obvious on the lighter colors that made the material look cheaper, and the seams more visible. I still highly recommend them in darker colors. Read more
items.author: Jennifer Taylor

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great travel essential
items.body: The perfect travel piece, well made, colors are rich looking. Can be layered with blazers, jackets or cardigans. Goes from casual to dressy depending on how you dress it. Washes well, I hang dry so can’t respond on shrinkage. Has just enough stretch to fit any figure. Run true to size. Read more
items.author: Sharon Hammond

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Gray, Lake Blue, Pink, Beige, Blue, Dark Blue, Hot Pink, Sage Green, Black, Coffee, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
